snippet: Kyle Wilson, who had an interception against the Bills, would replace Darrelle Revis, who sustained a concussion, if Revis was unable to play against the Steelers.
abstract: New York Jets cornerback Kyle Wilson is set to replace Darrelle Revis, who sustained a concussion, if Revis is unable to play in upcoming game against the Pittsburgh Steelers.
lead_paragraph: Kyle Wilson, who had an interception against the Bills, would replace Darrelle Revis, who sustained a concussion, if Revis was unable to play against the Steelers.

headline.seo: Jets’ Kyle Wilson Set to Replace Revis, if Necessary
headline.main: Wilson Set to Replace Revis, if Necessary
headline.print_headline: Wilson Set to Replace Revis, if Necessary
